Posts.Content: Scheduled for dec 1st. I am 69 years old. Gleason was 9 on biopsy PSA has risen rapidly over the last year I think it is 9 as well After thinking about all the post op complications like incontinence ( i have had a problem with dribble for a while) and impotence ( I still enjoy an occasional wank as you brits would say) I am wandering what kind of life expectancy I would have if I forgo the operation or maybe no one can tell but I dont mind speculation so at least I can consider the options. Geo
Posts.Title: Surgery Dec 1st Prostatectomy is it worth it
